enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Special report on the ozone layer and climate system - issues relating to hydrofluorocarbons and perfluorocarbons: The Secretariat introduced this issue (FCCC/SBSTA/2006/MISC.2 and MISC.7).
The EU and others supported further consideration at SBSTA 25, while CHINA and AUSTRALIA objected.
The US supported consideration under other SBSTA items.
Rawleston Moore (Barbados) will conduct informal consultations.
